mapper.select: SELECT hr.h_reserve_idx, DATE_FORMAT(hr.reserve_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reserveDate , ht.s_time, ht.e_time, h.h_name, FORMAT(h.h_price , 0) AS h_price, u.u_name, u.u_tel FROM hall_reservation AS hr Left join hall_time AS ht on hr.h_time_idx = ht.h_time_idx LEft join hall AS h on ht.u_idx = h.u_idx and ht.h_name = h.h_name LEft join company AS c on h.u_idx = c.u_idx Left join `user` AS u on c.u_idx = u.u_idx where hr.reserve_idx = #{u_idx} ORDER BY reserveDate DESC ;
